Question.Subject: How do create a reserve for buying stuff on ebay so if someone outbids you then you outbid them?
Question.Content: i was on ebay and i bid for something and straight away i was outbid so then i bid again but again i was out bid so they must have some kind a system where they set some kind of a reserve
Question.ChosenAnswer:
They put in a higher initial bid. Simple as that.
Example: your first bid is $5. Theirs is $100, but it only outbids you up to $6. So you bid $10 - their bid automatically goes to $11. You bid $20, their bid jumps to $21, etc. So just put the absolute maximum you're willing to pay, and it'll automatically top any lower bid submitted.
